title: SECLI LDN&JRS - DE-ISOLATION on PROD ONLY

task_list.instruction_title:
Please set the SECLI users in normal mode (remove read only mode) on PROD Like

Note: Users are set in Read ONLY mode in IP task [PRE-14236](PRE-14236_116109849.html)
Communication to SECLI Satellites: To be done by SECLI team, that SECLI LDN&JRS PROD is in normal mode
